titleStmt.title: The trve Protestant sovldier fighting valiantly under truths banner, and by the glorious light of Gods word overthrowing the strongest bulwarkes, and subtle stratagems of the Church of Rome. By Hamnet Warde.
titleStmt.author: Monginot, François, 1569-1637.
Ward, Hamnet.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for William Lee at the signe of the Turks-head in fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Translation of François Monginot's "Résolution des doutes, ou, Sommaire decision des controuerses entre l'Eglise reformee & l'Eglise romaine.".
Reproductions of the originals in the Harvard University Library (reel 1345:13) and the British Library (1836:21).
Identified at reel 1345:13 as Wing W768A (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).

place.placeName: the signe of the Turks-head in fleet-street
